errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.ts`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/ErrorScreen`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.
